    • Uses of Language in cipheringPackage

      Methods in cipheringPackage with parameters of type Language 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Encryption.encrypt(Language language)
      Method to encrypt the plain-text
      void Encryption.generateHomophons(Language language)
      This methods generate the homophones randomly and fill it in the homophones table each column of the table is called a strip the size of each strip is calculated carefully to fit every language in an optimum way
      void Key.setLanguage(Language language)
      Method to set the language
      void Key.setRandomAlphabet(Language language)
      A setter Method to create and set the Random Alphabet

    • Uses of Language in fileHandlingPackage

      Methods in fileHandlingPackage with parameters of type Language 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String FileHandling.openFile(Language language)
      This method opens a text file chosen by the user
      static Key FileHandling.openKey(Language language)
      This method opens a key file chosen by the user in a directory if the file doesn't exist in the the chosen directory it returns null this method catch all possible at-run-time errors that may happen and informs the user about it
      static void FileHandling.saveFile(Language language, java.lang.String text)
      This method saves the given text in a text file with the name and in the directory chosen by the user
      static void FileHandling.saveKey(Language language, Key key)
      This method create SaveDialog to save the given key object of type Key in a key File as an object it's declared static because it doesn't rely on any instance of this class so it can be accessed directly by invoking it directly from this class

    • Uses of Language in ValidationPackage

      Methods in ValidationPackage with parameters of type Language 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void Validation.validateHomophonesTable(Language language, java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> homophonesTable)
      This method validates the Homophones Table and throws NumberFormatException if there is any Non-digit among the homophones
      static void Validation.validateKeyword(Language language, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> keyword)
      This method validates the Keyword and throws InvalidKeywordException if there is any invalid input (i.e Empty Input or any invalid char such as a digit, a letter from another language) It overloads the the first method that validates the keyword too (this is an example about compile time polymorphism)
      static void Validation.validateKeyword(Language language, java.lang.String keyword)
      This method validates the Keyword and throws InvalidKeywordException if there is any invalid input (i.e Empty Input or any invalid char such as a digit, a letter from another language)
      static void Validation.validatePlainText(Language language, java.lang.String plainText)
      This method validates the Plain-Text and throws InvalidPlainTextException if there is any invalid input (i.e Empty Input or any invalid char such as a digit, a symbol or a letter from another language)
